name: headship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] the position of being in charge of an organization, especially a school: Dozens of well-qualified teachers applied for the headship.
[ C usually singular ] the period during which a particular person is in charge of a school or other organization: A lot of changes have taken place during her headship.
